carousel.name: Sacred Games
carousel.description:
Sacred Games is an Indian Hindi-language crime thriller streaming television
series based on Vikram Chandra's 2006 novel of the same name.

carousel.name: Squid Games
carousel.description:
Squid Game is a South Korean survival drama television
series streaming on Netflix. Written and directed by Hwang Dong-hyuk

carousel.name: Girl House
carousel.description:
Girl House is a 2014 Canadian horror slasher film
directed by Trevor Matthews and written by Nick Gordon.
